ing: 2 (15 ounce) cans black-eyed peas, rinsed and drained
1/2 small red onion, cut into slivers
des: "This is an easy, quick, and inexpensive salad to make. Two cans of black-eyed peas, cherry tomatoes, purple onion, and Italian dressing!"
ins: Lightly mix the black-eyed peas, cherry tomatoes, onion, and salad dressing together in a salad bowl; let stand for 1 hour to blend the flavors before serving.
